examples: Put your clothes in the cupboard.
She gave him presents and clothes.
All clothes are in mint condition and less than two years old.
She received many compliments on her stylish clothes.
My clothes won't all go in that one suitcase.
words.defineEn: the things we wear to cover our body, such as pants, shirts, and jackets
words.defineVi: những thứ chúng ta mặc để che thân, chẳng hạn như quần, áo sơ mi và áo khoác

examples: African clothing is known for its vibrant patterns and intricate designs.
He's a wolf in lamb's clothing.
We all met that wolf in sheep's clothing I guess at least once a life.
The doctor advised wearing protective clothing to minimize exposure to harmful radiation during the X-ray procedure.
Yesterday, her outfit was wild and woolly, with mismatched patterns and disheveled clothing.
words.defineEn: the items that we wear, particularly a specific type of items
words.defineVi: các mặt hàng mà chúng tôi mặc, đặc biệt là một loại mặt hàng cụ thể

examples: The department led the world in cancer research.
The HR department only shared the employee's personal information on a need-to-know basis.
The department has devolved into chaos without her leadership.
The department has placed its plans on hold pending the results of the elections.
The police department has encouraged officers to walk the beat.
words.defineEn: an area within a large store where a specific category of goods are sold
words.defineVi: một khu vực trong một cửa hàng lớn nơi bán một loại hàng hóa cụ thể

examples: Narrator: Canada Goose has found a niche between accessible outerwear like Patagonia and exclusive outerwear like Montcler and Prada.
Narrator: Canada Goose has found a niche between accessible outerwear like Patagonia and exclusive outerwear like Montcler and Prada.
We don't sell underwear yet in the Rhett and Link store, but we do sell outerwear like this Good Mythical Morning t-shirt!
And it has the ultimate off-putting accessory, an anemone: outerwear that actually stings.
Then, instead of discarding the newly hollow husks, the bugs fashion them into tasteful outerwear.
words.defineEn: items worn over other clothes, particularly when we are outdoors, such as jackets and coats
words.defineVi: các mặt hàng mặc ngoài quần áo khác, đặc biệt là khi chúng ta ở ngoài trời, chẳng hạn như áo khoác và áo khoác

examples: Is your jacket real leather?
The jacket sat beautifully on her shoulders.
Does this jacket go with this skirt?
I'll take the grey jacket.
I packed an extra jacket for the camping trip.
words.defineEn: a short item of clothing that we wear on the top part of out body, usually has sleeves and something in the front so we could close it
words.defineVi: một bộ quần áo ngắn mà chúng ta mặc ở phần trên cùng của cơ thể, thường có tay áo và một cái gì đó ở phía trước để chúng ta có thể đóng nó lại

examples: I need a lightweight sweater for the spring season.
He bought a new sweater with a colorful pattern for me.
I like to wear cozy sweaters and scarves during the fall season.
I like the comfort of wearing a cashmere sweater against my skin.
He prefers crewneck sweaters for a versatile and easy-to-wear option.
words.defineEn: a piece of clothing worn on the top part of our body that is made of cotton or wool, has long sleeves and a closed front
words.defineVi: một bộ quần áo mặc ở phần trên của cơ thể chúng ta được làm bằng bông hoặc len, có tay áo dài và mặt trước kín

examples: The media barely lays a glove on him.
Your article barely laid a glove on my arguments.
Nobody lays a glove on your joint.
Long Island Marine and Olympian boxer Jamel Herring hangs up the gloves after championship career.
And I worked hand and glove with him.
words.defineEn: item of clothing for our hands with a separate space for each finger
words.defineVi: mặt hàng quần áo cho bàn tay của chúng tôi với một không gian riêng biệt cho mỗi ngón tay

examples: He accidentally put his underwear on inside out.
He bought a pack of plain white underwear for everyday wear.
The store sells a variety of underwear styles, including briefs and boxers.
I prefer to wear comfortable cotton underwear.
I need to buy new underwear because my old ones are worn out.
words.defineEn: clothes that we wear under all the other pieces of clothing right on top of our skin
words.defineVi: quần áo mà chúng tôi mặc bên dưới tất cả các loại quần áo khác ngay trên da của chúng tôi

words.defineEn: men's underwear that loosely covers the thighs
words.defineVi: quần lót nam ôm sát đùi

examples: In 1939, the DuPont company released the first waves of nylon stockings, which provided women with a cheaper and more durable option for hosiery than their silk and rayon predecessors.
words.defineEn: socks, stockings, and tights, particularly used to refer to such items in stores
words.defineVi: vớ, vớ và quần bó, đặc biệt được dùng để chỉ những mặt hàng như vậy trong cửa hàng

examples: That movie knocked my socks off.
The new book is blowing my socks off.
The striped socks matched perfectly with his striped shirt.
She found a sock under the bed that had been missing for weeks.
She wore colorful socks that covered her feet.
words.defineEn: a soft item of clothing we wear on our feet
words.defineVi: một mặt hàng quần áo mềm chúng tôi mặc trên đôi chân của chúng tôi

words.defineEn: an item of women’s clothing that tightly covers the lower part of the body, from the waist to the toes, usually worn under dresses and skirts
words.defineVi: một bộ quần áo của phụ nữ che kín phần dưới của cơ thể, từ thắt lưng đến ngón chân, thường được mặc bên dưới váy và váy

examples: The bag broke under the weight of the bottles inside it.
My friend shared a bag of chocolate-covered macadamia nuts with us.
She put her bag on the table.
I left my bag downstairs in the entryway.
Each 180-litre container will hold up to three black bags of rubbish.
words.defineEn: something made of leather, cloth, plastic, or paper that we use to carry things in, particularly when we are traveling or shopping
words.defineVi: thứ gì đó làm bằng da, vải, nhựa hoặc giấy mà chúng ta dùng để đựng đồ, đặc biệt khi chúng ta đi du lịch hoặc mua sắm

examples: Her fashion sense is very old school, with vintage dresses and retro accessories.
The farmers grew a diverse range of accessory fruits on their orchard, including grapes and blueberries.
She bought a new hat to add a stylish accessory to her outfit.
The children were excited to try the unusual-looking dragon fruit, an exotic accessory fruit.
Ethan cuts a dash wherever he goes with his sharp suits and stylish accessories, leaving a lasting impression.
words.defineEn: an item, such as a bag, hat, piece of jewelry, etc., that is worn or carried because it makes an outfit more beautiful or attractive
words.defineVi: một món đồ, chẳng hạn như túi xách, mũ, đồ trang sức, v.v., được đeo hoặc mang theo vì nó làm cho bộ trang phục đẹp hơn hoặc hấp dẫn hơn

examples: She pursed her lips, showing disapproval.
She used to keep her phon in her purse.
She placed her purse on the chair next to her at the restaurant.
MY wife opened her purse and pulled out a pen to write a note.
She always carries a small purse to hold her keys and wallet.
words.defineEn: a small bag that is used, particularly by women, to carry personal items
words.defineVi: một chiếc túi nhỏ được sử dụng, đặc biệt là phụ nữ, để mang theo các vật dụng cá nhân

examples: Businesses were tightening their belts and cutting jobs.
My brother always wears a belt with his pants to keep them from falling down.
With several successful projects under her belt, she's definitely on the way to becoming a top executive.
I know she really wants the promotion, but she really hit me below the belt by telling the boss about my personal problems.
We’re tightening our belts after the holidays.
words.defineEn: a long and narrow item that we usually wear around our waist to hold our clothes in place or to decorate our outfit
words.defineVi: một món đồ dài và hẹp mà chúng ta thường đeo quanh eo để giữ cố định quần áo hoặc để trang trí cho trang phục của mình

words.defineEn: clothes that are made for sleeping
words.defineVi: quần áo được làm để ngủ

words.defineEn: a long piece of clothing, made from the same material that towels are made of, worn after or before taking a shower or bath
words.defineVi: một bộ quần áo dài, được làm từ cùng chất liệu với khăn tắm, được mặc sau hoặc trước khi tắm vòi sen hoặc bồn tắm

words.defineEn: clothing that we usually wear when exercising or playing sports
words.defineVi: quần áo mà chúng ta thường mặc khi tập thể dục hoặc chơi thể thao

words.defineEn: a shoe that is light, comfortable, and suitable for running and other sports
words.defineVi: một đôi giày nhẹ, thoải mái và phù hợp để chạy và các môn thể thao khác

examples: Many wearing shorts and T-SHIRTS.
words.defineEn: short pants that end either above or on the knees
words.defineVi: quần ngắn kết thúc ở trên hoặc trên đầu gối

words.defineEn: clothing made for men
words.defineVi: quần áo làm cho nam giới

words.defineEn: clothing made for women
words.defineVi: quần áo làm cho phụ nữ

words.defineEn: loose pants that we usually wear for exercising
words.defineVi: quần ống rộng mà chúng ta thường mặc để tập thể dục
